title: Zentropy Software Intern (Jun. 2024 - Aug. 2024)
description: During my technical internship at Zentropy, I gained hands-on experience in e-bike maintenance, battery management, and product packaging. I developed technical skills in programming microcontrollers using C with the STM32 IDE, creating Python scripts for data management and API integration, and developing a chatbot prototype using AI. My contributions included improving e-bike and battery systems, automating data processes, and laying the groundwork for AI-driven customer interaction tools. This experience enhanced my problem-solving, collaboration, and time management skills, and solidified my interest in a career that blends hardware and software development.

title: HackUMass Presenter (Nov. 2023 - Nov. 2023)
description: Led a workshop at HackUMass for over 40 participants, covering the fundamentals of neural network architecture. Provided an introduction to neural networks and guided attendees through building their own models.
